name: Haunted Manor: The Last Reunion Collector's Edition
name_original: Haunted Manor: The Last Reunion Collector's Edition
description:
Haunted Manor: The Last Reunion Collector's Edition is a casual adventure game developed by Eipix Entertainment. It came out on 24-05-2018. Big Fish Games published the game. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
Haunted Manor: The Last Reunion Collector's Edition is available on PC.
